full_text: Please, consider adding the pattern to your FAVORITES if you like it or plan on making it NOTE: If you are a tight knitter, add an EXTRA repeat or go up a needle size Tiilda Hat Tiilda Hat is a simple, joyous project, that just like Tiilda Mittens was born out of warm memories of cold, sparkling white and beautiful winters in Latvia. It’s a fast and rewarding knit, with a simple pattern repeat and lots of texture, and due to the bulky weight yarn can be finished in one evening. You can read more and download the free Tiilda Mittens pattern here: Tiilda Mittens The pattern includes written instructions and cable pattern chart. SIZE One Size - to fit head circumference of 22” - 23” (56cm - 58.5cm) YARN & YARDAGE Deramores Vintage Chunky, 50% Merino Wool, 50% Acrylic, 153yards (140m) per 100gr ball. 1 ball in colour Chalk. OR Bulky (Chunky) Weight Yarn. Approximately 147-153 yards (135m-140m). Yardage includes 3 3/8” (85mm) pompom NEEDLES US 6/ 4mm circulars with 16” (40cm) cable US 8/ 5mm circulars with 16” (40cm) cable GAUGE 15 stitches and 22 rows to 4” (10cm) in larger size needles NOTIONS Cable needle, stitch marker, tapestry needle, 3 3/8” (85mm) size pompom maker Happy knitting!
